lines.text: It's in the Princess, not the pea! Ha ha ha ha!

[the "birthmark" on Hildegard's foot is smudged, proving that it's fake]
Ahahahaha! I was right! Hildegard is NOT your daughter, Heath!
Ah! The pig's out of the bag!
[Fearless the pig pops out of his hiding place - Princess and Hungry appear as well]
Fearless? Princess, Hungry! But if you're here, then...
Heath, your daughter is...
[camera pans to Laird above the crowd, Daria in his clutches]
Let me GO!
DARIA!
Take another step, and she goes over the side!
[laughs]
Helsa and Hildegard! Come to me!

[grabbing as much food as she can]
I'm coming, I'm coming...
NOW!
[the women hurry]
Hildegard... LAIRD! Where is your conscious?
You're so predictable! Blade!
[he throws a dagger to his bird, who flies to the chandelier above Rollo, cutting the ropes that hold it up]
Say goodbye to your "future son-in-law"!
ROLLO!
[pushes Rollo out of the way, diving under the falling chandelier himself - it crushes him, and he appears dead]
What a tragic accident! At this time of sorrow, I *sadly* proclaim myself king, and denounce this girl as an imposter!

[slowly lifting his head]
Wrong... again... brother!
Hmm?
[whining]
I WANT THE KINGDOM!

[getting up]
Let... my daughter... free!

[groaning]
My reign was short but glorious.
[takes off with Daria]
